metadata.title: CVE-2015-5290 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in ircd-ratbox 3.0.9 in theMONITOR Command Handler.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5290` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

charybdis - 3.4.2-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: charybdis package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.2-5').
